subHeading: Real Estate and Business Law Firm in Santa Rosa
valueProp: Beyers Costin Simon is a leading real estate and business law firm in Santa Rosa, providing expert counsel and creative solutions to clients for over 40 years.

testimonalData.text: Beyers Costin Simon provided exceptional legal support for my real estate development project. Highly recommended!
testimonalData.author: John Smith

testimonalData.text: The team at Beyers Costin Simon helped me navigate a complex business dispute with great success. Thank you!

testimonalData.text: I was impressed by the dedication and expertise of Beyers Costin Simon in handling my real estate transaction. Top-notch service!
